description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Noonu Atoll, Maldives. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.vendor_name: Kuredhivaru Resort & Spa Maldives (previously MoÌˆvenpick Resort Kuredhivaru Maldives)
hotels.title: Noonu Atoll Haven with Signature Dining & World-Class Spa
hotels.description: This five-star retreat is a haven of tranquillity, boasting an undisturbed location on the Noonu Atoll offering an unforgettable Maldivian escape. Dine on spectacular seafood at the overwater Bodumas restaurant or indulge in a signature chocolate hour to sweeten your escape. Spend your days exploring the waters around the resort with complimentary non-motorised water sports, including kayaks and stand-up paddle boards, or discover the vibrant underwater world with a dive at the resort's PADI dive centre. For a change of pace, experience a curated treatment at Sun Spa by Healing Earth and let yourself melt away.

seo.title: Hotel a Noonu Atoll - Maldives Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Noonu Atoll, Maldives con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
